Q0: BRCA testing (BRCA1 and BRCA2 gene analysis)
Q17: The policy requires that the test be ordered by an appropriate specialist, that the patient meet medical necessity criteria (including personal or family history of cancer), and that genetic counseling be provided. Prior authorization is required. Submit documentation of clinical indications, family history, and genetic counseling if applicable. In this case, the claim would not be approved as submitted.
